categories: Category:Imperial Army generals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: High General Touno was the commander of the Imperial garrison in the southern district of Svivren as of 4 ABY. A portly Human male with brown eyes and thinning brown hair, he was a reflection of the sparse and badly-disciplined troops he had under his command. One of his staff officers was Captain Strok, who was actually working for the organized crime group Black Nebula
